title: Table 167 - Row 1
clause_text: 10.: 11. | Whether area for inclusive housing is required as per Regulation No.3.8 ? Please state the details.: (a) What is the width of the front marginal distance(s) ? If the building abuts two or more roads, does the front marginal distance comply with Regulation ?

headers: Whether area for inclusive housing is required as per Regulation No.3.8 ? Please state the details.
values: (a) What is the width of the front marginal distance(s) ? If the building abuts two or more roads, does the front marginal distance comply with Regulation ?
